answers.answer: Hi,Your concern for radiation causing cancer is valid. However, the dose of radiation from a chest X-ray is very small, that it is common to have patients undergo repeat chest X-rays over the course of a week or so (for patients who have infections). The best way to avoid lung cancer is to stop smoking. Make a change. Talk about quitting.
